title: 🛂 First Student Visa Granted
details: Granted the initial Student (subclass 500) visa, allowing me to formally study the Bachelor of Information Technology in Australia. This visa was valid until August 30, 2023.

title: 📝 Applied for Visa Extension
details: Applied for a new Student Visa to cover the extended course duration. A Bridging A visa was granted on this day to maintain my legal status while the application was processed.

title: ✅ Student Visa Extension Granted
details: The new Student (subclass 500) visa was granted, extending my stay until March 15, 2025, to allow for the completion of my degree.

title: 🎓 IT Degree Completed
details: Completed Bachelor of Information Technology at Griffith University. This qualification enables the 485 visa and forms the basis for Australian Study points.

title: 📨 Applied for Graduate Visa (485)
details: Lodged the application for the Temporary Graduate (subclass 485) visa after completing my degree. A Bridging A visa was granted on this day.

title: 🛂 485 Visa Granted
details: Subclass 485 visa granted, valid until Feb 2027. A 1-year regional extension is available due to study in Gold Coast.

title: 🧱 Cert III Started
details: Commenced CPC33020 Certificate III in Bricklaying at Skills Australia Institute, Perth, on the 485 visa.

title: 🎯 Cert III Completed
details: Successfully qualified as a bricklayer. This unlocks the ability to apply for the Provisional Skills Assessment (PSA).

title: 🔨 Paid Work Started
details: Began paid employment as a bricklayer. The first 90 days can be back-claimed for the JRP if the JRE application is submitted promptly.

title: 📋 PSA Application
details: Lodged the Provisional Skills Assessment with TRA, the first mandatory step of the Job Ready Program.

title: 🚀 JRP Registered (JRE)
details: Registered for Job Ready Employment (JRE), officially starting the 1725-hour / 12-month countdown.

title: ✅ 485 Regional Extension Applied
details: Apply for the 1-year regional extension. This is a critical step to extend the visa runway from Feb 2027 to Feb 2028.

title: 🔍 Workplace Assessment (JRWA)
details: Mid-program assessment by a TRA assessor to verify skills and competency in a real-world Australian workplace.

title: 🏆 JRP Completed & Full Skills Assessment
details: Completed 1725 hours and received a positive Job Ready Final Assessment (JRFA), securing a full skills assessment and 5 work experience points.

title: 🌟 WA Nomination EOI
details: Submitted Expression of Interest (EOI) targeting WA state nomination (190/491). The high points score and priority occupation provide a strong advantage.

title: 📨 Invitation Received
details: Received an official invitation from Home Affairs to apply for a skilled visa within 60 days.

title: 🎊 PR Visa Lodged
details: Lodged the Subclass 190/491 visa application, automatically activating a Bridging Visa A to remain in Australia legally.

title: 🇦🇺 PR GRANTED
details: The ultimate goal achieved! Permanent Residency granted, providing the freedom to live and work anywhere in Australia.

title: 💻 Transition Back to IT
details: Begin the transition back to the IT sector by updating the CV, pursuing relevant certifications (Azure, CCNA, etc.), and applying for roles as a Permanent Resident.
